content.original: Reliques I
content.prevOriginal: Reliques I
content.content: Reliques I

content.original: Thank God, you are here, Commander.
content.prevOriginal: Thank God, you are here, Commander.
content.content: Thank God, you are here, Commander.

content.original: If you can take down the defensive and capture the base, We can meet up and discuss business..
content.prevOriginal: If you can take down the defensive and capture the base, We can meet up and discuss business..
content.content: If you can take down the defensive and capture the base, We can meet up and discuss business..

content.original: We got caught outside of our mechs and have been brought here for 'Safe Keeping'.
content.prevOriginal: We got caught outside of our mechs and have been brought here for 'Safe Keeping'.
content.content: We got caught outside of our mechs and have been brought here for 'Safe Keeping'.

content.original: I think you will like what we found, Thank you for the Rescue.
content.prevOriginal: I think you will like what we found, Thank you for the Rescue.
content.content: I think you will like what we found, Thank you for the Rescue.

content.original: Were glad to be of assistance.
content.prevOriginal: Were glad to be of assistance.
content.content: Were glad to be of assistance.

content.original: I will send communications asap, once we get situated.
content.prevOriginal: I will send communications asap, once we get situated.
content.content: I will send communications asap, once we get situated.

content.original: We will head back to the Argos, Try not to be kidnaped in the meantime.
content.prevOriginal: We will head back to the Argos, Try not to be kidnaped in the meantime.
content.content: We will head back to the Argos, Try not to be kidnaped in the meantime.

content.original: Sorry Commander, The base defenses were just to much.
content.prevOriginal: Sorry Commander, The base defenses were just to much.
content.content: Sorry Commander, The base defenses were just to much.

content.original: Bogeys on sensors!
content.prevOriginal: Bogeys on sensors!
content.content: На радарах что то есть!

content.original: [GENERIC VO] Area is not clear, Commander. Eliminate the hostiles before continuing to the next Objective.
content.prevOriginal: [GENERIC VO] Area is not clear, Commander. Eliminate the hostiles before continuing to the next Objective.
content.content: [GENERIC VO] Район занят противником, командир. Устраните врагов, прежде чем перейти к следующей цели.

content.original: [GENERIC VO] Sensors are clear, proceed to the next objective.
content.prevOriginal: [GENERIC VO] Sensors are clear, proceed to the next objective.
content.content: [GENERIC VO] На радарах чисто, приступаем к следующей задаче.

content.original: Our ride has arrived, Thank you for the assist Commander.
content.prevOriginal: Our ride has arrived, Thank you for the assist Commander.
content.content: Our ride has arrived, Thank you for the assist Commander.

content.original: They are very stubborn in their attempt to keep me here. Those are some pretty big guns Commander
content.prevOriginal: They are very stubborn in their attempt to keep me here. Those are some pretty big guns Commander
content.content: They are very stubborn in their attempt to keep me here. Those are some pretty big guns Commander

content.original: This doesn't look good. They must know what I have found.
content.prevOriginal: This doesn't look good. They must know what I have found.
content.content: This doesn't look good. They must know what I have found.

content.original: Hopefully we can wrap this up before the Local government gets involved.
content.prevOriginal: Hopefully we can wrap this up before the Local government gets involved.
content.content: Hopefully we can wrap this up before the Local government gets involved.

content.original: Seems the Pirates are after something here. And they have come in full force.
content.prevOriginal: Seems the Pirates are after something here. And they have come in full force.
content.content: Seems the Pirates are after something here. And they have come in full force.

content.original: The objective to scout the base that is being captured. Must be completed before the actual capture of the base.
content.prevOriginal: The objective to scout the base that is being captured. Must be completed before the actual capture of the base.
content.content: The objective to scout the base that is being captured. Must be completed before the actual capture of the base.

content.original: Scout the Facility
content.prevOriginal: Scout the Facility
content.content: Scout the Facility

content.original: The objective to optionally destroy the defenders of the base.
content.prevOriginal: The objective to optionally destroy the defenders of the base.
content.content: The objective to optionally destroy the defenders of the base.

content.original: Destroy the Defenders
content.prevOriginal: Destroy the Defenders
content.content: Уничтожьте защитников

content.original: The objective for the player to move into and capture the base.
content.prevOriginal: The objective for the player to move into and capture the base.
content.content: The objective for the player to move into and capture the base.

content.original: Capture the Base with Friendly 'Mechs
content.prevOriginal: Capture the Base with Friendly 'Mechs
content.content: Захватить базу совместно с дружественными мехами

content.original: HIDDEN TIMER, NO NEED TO EDIT: This is the hidden timer objective that will trigger the enemy reinforcements.
content.prevOriginal: HIDDEN TIMER, NO NEED TO EDIT: This is the hidden timer objective that will trigger the enemy reinforcements.
content.content: HIDDEN TIMER, NO NEED TO EDIT: This is the hidden timer objective that will trigger the enemy reinforcements.

content.original: Hold Out as Enemies Counter-Attack
content.prevOriginal: Hold Out as Enemies Counter-Attack
content.content: Hold Out as Enemies Counter-Attack

content.original: This is a general objective to indicate the player must keep playing and eliminate enemies as they come.
content.prevOriginal: This is a general objective to indicate the player must keep playing and eliminate enemies as they come.
content.content: This is a general objective to indicate the player must keep playing and eliminate enemies as they come.

content.original: Pacify the Area around the Base
content.prevOriginal: Pacify the Area around the Base
content.content: Pacify the Area around the Base

content.original: The primary objective to destroy the force that tries to remove the player from the captured base.
content.prevOriginal: The primary objective to destroy the force that tries to remove the player from the captured base.
content.content: The primary objective to destroy the force that tries to remove the player from the captured base.

content.original: Destroy the Enemy Reinforcements
content.prevOriginal: Destroy the Enemy Reinforcements
content.content: Уничтожьте подкрепление врага

content.original: The chunk controlled objective to destroy the turrets for the base, if the chunk is active.
content.prevOriginal: The chunk controlled objective to destroy the turrets for the base, if the chunk is active.
content.content: The chunk controlled objective to destroy the turrets for the base, if the chunk is active.

content.original: Eliminate Base Turrets
content.prevOriginal: Eliminate Base Turrets
content.content: Устранение турелей на базе

content.original: Commander, It seems our employer has been cornered in. We may have to get them out of there hiding spot before we talk to them.
content.prevOriginal: Commander, It seems our employer has been cornered in. We may have to get them out of there hiding spot before we talk to them.
content.content: Командир, похоже, наш работодатель загнан в угол. Возможно, нам придется вытащить их из окружения, прежде чем мы с ними поговорим.

content.original: Reliques II
content.prevOriginal: Reliques II
content.content: Reliques II

content.original: Commander, you arrived just in time. Those pirates are almost upon us.
content.prevOriginal: Commander, you arrived just in time. Those pirates are almost upon us.
content.content: Командир, вы прибыли как раз вовремя. Эти пираты почти достали нас.

content.original: Interstellar Expeditions has provided us with the technicians we need to get this base back up and running.
content.prevOriginal: Interstellar Expeditions has provided us with the technicians we need to get this base back up and running.
content.content: Interstellar Expeditions has provided us with the technicians we need to get this base back up and running.

content.original: Lets hold this line so we can get these artifacts off world.
content.prevOriginal: Lets hold this line so we can get these artifacts off world.
content.content: Lets hold this line so we can get these artifacts off world.

content.original: There are some very unique things buried under this complex.
content.prevOriginal: There are some very unique things buried under this complex.
content.content: There are some very unique things buried under this complex.

content.original: Great work commander. Lets meet up and discuss payment.
content.prevOriginal: Great work commander. Lets meet up and discuss payment.
content.content: Great work commander. Lets meet up and discuss payment.

content.original: No, oh No, everything is lost. Interstellar Expeditions will not be happy with this
content.prevOriginal: No, oh No, everything is lost. Interstellar Expeditions will not be happy with this
content.content: No, oh No, everything is lost. Interstellar Expeditions will not be happy with this

content.original: Turrets online, IE will be happy with the results.
content.prevOriginal: Turrets online, IE will be happy with the results.
content.content: Turrets online, IE will be happy with the results.

content.original: Warning commander, sensors are reading multiple contacts approaching from multiple vectors. Looks like the attacking force has brought reinforcements.
content.prevOriginal: Warning commander, sensors are reading multiple contacts approaching from multiple vectors. Looks like the attacking force has brought reinforcements.
content.content: Warning commander, sensors are reading multiple contacts approaching from multiple vectors. Looks like the attacking force has brought reinforcements.

content.original: No, No, No. These things are old and fragile, they can't be shaken like this.
content.prevOriginal: No, No, No. These things are old and fragile, they can't be shaken like this.
content.content: No, No, No. These things are old and fragile, they can't be shaken like this.

content.original: Hundreds of years of research lost in just a mere moment.
content.prevOriginal: Hundreds of years of research lost in just a mere moment.
content.content: Hundreds of years of research lost in just a mere moment.

content.original: We have almost lost all of this find Commander.
content.prevOriginal: We have almost lost all of this find Commander.
content.content: We have almost lost all of this find Commander.

content.original: We are halfway loaded Commander. Keep up the good work
content.prevOriginal: We are halfway loaded Commander. Keep up the good work
content.content: We are halfway loaded Commander. Keep up the good work

content.original: Commander, on this outing we have some additional support from our employer.
content.prevOriginal: Commander, on this outing we have some additional support from our employer.
content.content: Командир, в этой походе у нас есть дополнительная поддержка со стороны нашего работодателя.

content.original: They have point defenses set up around the base. However, they are off-line.
content.prevOriginal: They have point defenses set up around the base. However, they are off-line.
content.content: They have point defenses set up around the base. However, they are off-line.

content.original: We have a friendly convoy with engineers who are eager to get at those defenses, so they can bring them online.
content.prevOriginal: We have a friendly convoy with engineers who are eager to get at those defenses, so they can bring them online.
content.content: We have a friendly convoy with engineers who are eager to get at those defenses, so they can bring them online.

content.original: Escort them safely to the generators and we can boost our defensive capability with those turrets activated. Good luck!
content.prevOriginal: Escort them safely to the generators and we can boost our defensive capability with those turrets activated. Good luck!
content.content: Escort them safely to the generators and we can boost our defensive capability with those turrets activated. Good luck!

content.original: Looks like the Pirates have brought in the 5th fleet commander.
content.prevOriginal: Looks like the Pirates have brought in the 5th fleet commander.
content.content: Looks like the Pirates have brought in the 5th fleet commander.

content.original: Defend Targeted Base Structures from Attackers
content.prevOriginal: Defend Targeted Base Structures from Attackers
content.content: Защита целевых базовых структур от нападающих

content.original: Defend the Target Buildings
content.prevOriginal: Defend the Target Buildings
content.content: Защитите целевые здания

content.original: Destroy the enemy vanguard force, the first wave.
content.prevOriginal: Destroy the enemy vanguard force, the first wave.
content.content: Уничтожьте авангард врага, первой волны.

content.original: Destroy the Pirate Vanguard
content.prevOriginal: Destroy the Pirate Vanguard
content.content: Уничтожьте пиратский авангард

content.original: Optional objective to keep ALL target structures intact.
content.prevOriginal: Optional objective to keep ALL target structures intact.
content.content: Optional objective to keep ALL target structures intact.

content.original: Defend ALL Target Buildings from Destruction
content.prevOriginal: Defend ALL Target Buildings from Destruction
content.content: Защитите ВСЕ целевые здания от разрушения

content.original: Objective for tracking the time left in the mission. While the player it told to Hold Out for Reinforcements
content.prevOriginal: Objective for tracking the time left in the mission. While the player it told to Hold Out for Reinforcements
content.content: Objective for tracking the time left in the mission. While the player it told to Hold Out for Reinforcements

content.original: Hold Out for Reinforcements
content.prevOriginal: Hold Out for Reinforcements
content.content: Hold Out for Reinforcements

content.original: Escort Engineer APCs to Base Defenses in order to take control of them.
content.prevOriginal: Escort Engineer APCs to Base Defenses in order to take control of them.
content.content: Escort Engineer APCs to Base Defenses in order to take control of them.

content.original: Escort Engineer APCs to the Base Defenses
content.prevOriginal: Escort Engineer APCs to the Base Defenses
content.content: Escort Engineer APCs to the Base Defenses

content.original: Hidden Objective: Destroy the Second Lance
content.prevOriginal: Hidden Objective: Destroy the Second Lance
content.content: Hidden Objective: Destroy the Second Lance

content.original: Hidden Objective: Destroy the Second Lance
content.prevOriginal: Hidden Objective: Destroy the Second Lance
content.content: Hidden Objective: Destroy the Second Lance

content.original: Hidden Objective: Destroy the Third Lance
content.prevOriginal: Hidden Objective: Destroy the Third Lance
content.content: Hidden Objective: Destroy the Third Lance

content.original: Hidden Objective: Destroy the Third Lance
content.prevOriginal: Hidden Objective: Destroy the Third Lance
content.content: Hidden Objective: Destroy the Third Lance

content.original: Davion Forces Inbound
content.prevOriginal: Davion Forces Inbound
content.content: Силы Дэвиона прибывают

content.original: Hold of the pirates while we secure the assets here.
content.prevOriginal: Hold of the pirates while we secure the assets here.
content.content: Hold of the pirates while we secure the assets here.

content.original: Reliques II
content.prevOriginal: Reliques II
content.content: Reliques II

content.original: You're coming up on the local government facility, Commander.
content.prevOriginal: You're coming up on the local government facility, Commander.
content.content: You're coming up on the local government facility, Commander.

content.original: It seems lightly defended.
content.prevOriginal: It seems lightly defended.
content.content: It seems lightly defended.

content.original: Once you've reached the facility and picked up the pilot, move to the LZ.
content.prevOriginal: Once you've reached the facility and picked up the pilot, move to the LZ.
content.content: Once you've reached the facility and picked up the pilot, move to the LZ.

content.original: We will come get you Stat!
content.prevOriginal: We will come get you Stat!
content.content: We will come get you Stat!

content.original: We got him commander! Thank you!
content.prevOriginal: We got him commander! Thank you!
content.content: We got him commander! Thank you!

content.original: The pilot's in bad shape and needs a medical, ASAP.
content.prevOriginal: The pilot's in bad shape and needs a medical, ASAP.
content.content: The pilot's in bad shape and needs a medical, ASAP.

content.original: I hope he is going to be ok.
content.prevOriginal: I hope he is going to be ok.
content.content: I hope he is going to be ok.

content.original: Our friend barely made it. I hope our employer doesn't push this specialist too hard.
content.prevOriginal: Our friend barely made it. I hope our employer doesn't push this specialist too hard.
content.content: Our friend barely made it. I hope our employer doesn't push this specialist too hard.

content.original: IE is going to be real unhappy about this.
content.prevOriginal: IE is going to be real unhappy about this.
content.content: IE is going to be real unhappy about this.

content.original: Our men will load the specialist up for you and tend to their injuries. Thank you, Commander.
content.prevOriginal: Our men will load the specialist up for you and tend to their injuries. Thank you, Commander.
content.content: Our men will load the specialist up for you and tend to their injuries. Thank you, Commander.

content.original: [GENERIC VO] The asset is sustaining damage, Commander!
content.prevOriginal: [GENERIC VO] The asset is sustaining damage, Commander!
content.content: [GENERIC VO] Груз получает урон, командир!

content.original: [GENERIC VO] The secondary asset is sustaining damage, Commander!
content.prevOriginal: [GENERIC VO] The secondary asset is sustaining damage, Commander!
content.content: [GENERIC VO] Второстепенный груз получает урон, командир!

content.original: [GENERIC VO] The asset has been recovered, Commander. Good work.
content.prevOriginal: [GENERIC VO] The asset has been recovered, Commander. Good work.
content.content: [GENERIC VO] Груз был возвращен, командир. Хорошая работа.

content.original: [GENERIC VO] The secondary asset has been recovered, Commander.
content.prevOriginal: [GENERIC VO] The secondary asset has been recovered, Commander.
content.content: [GENERIC VO] Второй груз был возвращен, командир.

content.original: Mission failure. I'll notify IE.
content.prevOriginal: Mission failure. I'll notify IE.
content.content: Mission failure. I'll notify IE.

content.original: Specialized Pilot?
content.prevOriginal: Specialized Pilot?
content.content: Specialized Pilot?

content.original: The objective for the player to retrieve the primary target.
content.prevOriginal: The objective for the player to retrieve the primary target.
content.content: The objective for the player to retrieve the primary target.

content.original: Recover the Pilot by Securing the Designated Area
content.prevOriginal: Recover the Pilot by Securing the Designated Area
content.content: Recover the Pilot by Securing the Designated Area

content.original: UNUSED KILL OBJECTIVE for AutoComplete
content.prevOriginal: UNUSED KILL OBJECTIVE for AutoComplete
content.content: UNUSED KILL OBJECTIVE for AutoComplete

content.original: Hidden KILL OBJECTIVE for OpFor1
content.prevOriginal: Hidden KILL OBJECTIVE for OpFor1
content.content: Hidden KILL OBJECTIVE for OpFor1

content.original: The objective to escape with all player units.
content.prevOriginal: The objective to escape with all player units.
content.content: The objective to escape with all player units.

content.original: Get to the Evac Zone
content.prevOriginal: Get to the Evac Zone
content.content: Get to the Evac Zone

content.original: The objective to keep the unit which is carrying the primary target alive. Player will fail if it is destroyed.
content.prevOriginal: The objective to keep the unit which is carrying the primary target alive. Player will fail if it is destroyed.
content.content: The objective to keep the unit which is carrying the primary target alive. Player will fail if it is destroyed.

content.original: Ensure the Primary Asset Recovery Unit Survives
content.prevOriginal: Ensure the Primary Asset Recovery Unit Survives
content.content: Убедитесь, что подразделение по восстановлению первичных активов выживает

content.original: We can't leave technology like this in their hands.
content.prevOriginal: We can't leave technology like this in their hands.
content.content: We can't leave technology like this in their hands.

content.original: Recover the Pilot's Gear by Securing the Secondary Designated Area
content.prevOriginal: Recover the Pilot's Gear by Securing the Secondary Designated Area
content.content: Recover the Pilot's Gear by Securing the Secondary Designated Area

content.original: Hidden KILL OBJECTIVE for autocomplete of mission
content.prevOriginal: Hidden KILL OBJECTIVE for autocomplete of mission
content.content: Hidden KILL OBJECTIVE for autocomplete of mission

content.original: Hidden KILL OBJECTIVE for OpFor2
content.prevOriginal: Hidden KILL OBJECTIVE for OpFor2
content.content: Hidden KILL OBJECTIVE for OpFor2

content.original: The objective to keep the unit which is carrying the secondary target alive. The player can fail this objective.
content.prevOriginal: The objective to keep the unit which is carrying the secondary target alive. The player can fail this objective.
content.content: The objective to keep the unit which is carrying the secondary target alive. The player can fail this objective.

content.original: Ensure the Secondary Asset Recovery Unit Survives
content.prevOriginal: Ensure the Secondary Asset Recovery Unit Survives
content.content: Ensure the Secondary Asset Recovery Unit Survives

content.original: We need to pick up a specialized pilot for the next mission. They were separated from us and the IE and they're mission critical to this operation. I'm sure this will pay off.
content.prevOriginal: We need to pick up a specialized pilot for the next mission. They were separated from us and the IE and they're mission critical to this operation. I'm sure this will pay off.
content.content: We need to pick up a specialized pilot for the next mission. They were separated from us and the IE and they're mission critical to this operation. I'm sure this will pay off.

content.original: Reliques III
content.prevOriginal: Reliques III
content.content: Reliques III

content.original: Just point me at them. I am not use to flying, so this will be quite the experience.
content.prevOriginal: Just point me at them. I am not use to flying, so this will be quite the experience.
content.content: Just point me at them. I am not use to flying, so this will be quite the experience.

content.original: Looks like we have two of them, just as predicted. Should get some good data out of this.
content.prevOriginal: Looks like we have two of them, just as predicted. Should get some good data out of this.
content.content: Looks like we have two of them, just as predicted. Should get some good data out of this.

content.original: Be careful out there. running solo is always a risk.
content.prevOriginal: Be careful out there. running solo is always a risk.
content.content: Будьте осторожны там. Один в поле не воин.

content.original: I got this. I owe it to IE to get the data on this ancient battlemech.
content.prevOriginal: I got this. I owe it to IE to get the data on this ancient battlemech.
content.content: I got this. I owe it to IE to get the data on this ancient battlemech.

content.original: I was flying, Commander! Flying! They never saw me coming. Pew! Pew! Pew!
content.prevOriginal: I was flying, Commander! Flying! They never saw me coming. Pew! Pew! Pew!
content.content: I was flying, Commander! Flying! They never saw me coming. Pew! Pew! Pew!

content.original: I wrecked it. I'll talk to you when I'm back onboard, Commander.
content.prevOriginal: I wrecked it. I'll talk to you when I'm back onboard, Commander.
content.content: I wrecked it. I'll talk to you when I'm back onboard, Commander.

content.original: A primary target is damaged, Commander! Keep it up!
content.prevOriginal: A primary target is damaged, Commander! Keep it up!
content.content: Основная цель повреждена, командир! Так держать!

content.original: Always wanted to be a MechCommander.
content.prevOriginal: Always wanted to be a MechCommander.
content.content: Всегда хотел быть командиром мехов.

content.original: The primary objective to destroy the enemy lance.
content.prevOriginal: The primary objective to destroy the enemy lance.
content.content: The primary objective to destroy the enemy lance.

content.original: Destroy the Pirate
content.prevOriginal: Destroy the Pirate
content.content: Уничтожить пирата

content.original: An OPTIONAL primary objective to destroy the second enemy lance.
content.prevOriginal: An OPTIONAL primary objective to destroy the second enemy lance.
content.content: НЕОБЯЗАТЕЛЬНАЯ основная цель - уничтожить второе копье противника.

content.original: Destroy the Second  Pirate
content.prevOriginal: Destroy the Second  Pirate
content.content: Уничтожьте второго пирата

content.original: Alright, Commander. I'd like to give this data collection mission a try. We have a small group of pirates and I'll ambush them. I need you as my eyes in the sky. You direct the fire and I'll bring it down.
content.prevOriginal: Alright, Commander. I'd like to give this data collection mission a try. We have a small group of pirates and I'll ambush them. I need you as my eyes in the sky. You direct the fire and I'll bring it down.
content.content: Хорошо, командир. Я хотел бы попробовать эту миссию по сбору данных. У нас есть небольшая группа пиратов, и я устрою им засаду. Ты мне нужен как мои глаза в небе. Вы наведёте меня, а я нанесу удар.

content.original: Sharon Bryan, an up and comming officer in Steiner, has requested our aid.
content.prevOriginal: Sharon Bryan, an up and comming officer in Steiner, has requested our aid.
content.content: Sharon Bryan, an up and comming officer in Steiner, has requested our aid.

content.original: Reliques
content.prevOriginal: Reliques
content.content: Reliques
